column4: for what purpose? There are a few things which perform similar functions, debsums is one, tripwire and aide log md5sums for the whole system (or as much of it as you want) and can be quite useful as intrusion detection tools
yes, that is the name of the package.
I mounted the same partition by accident twice. I get some segfaults running terraView. So I want to ensure that my double mounting didn't cause too much troube.
